replies.bodyText: I think we merging the hadoop configuration couple of times in the presto flow. Can we please have a look at that as well? And suggest the best way to use Alluxio interface? @apc999 @calvinjia
replies.author: jainxrohit

replies.bodyText:
I have some analysis here #11404 why the initialize method is called multiple times.
Essentially it is because the part of integration in Presto is still a workaround to some degree to bridge AlluxioFileSystem and ExtendedFileSystem. I want to address it in followup PRs by having Presto depending on Alluxio LocalCache interface, rather than an abstract class.
